<style>  
.gs_toggle_mode {
      position: relative;
      display: flex;
      width: 30px;
      height: 30px;
      background-color: transparent;
      cursor: pointer;
      transition: background-color 0.0s ease;
      align-content: center;
      align-items: center;
      align-self: center;
    }
.gs_toggle_mode.active {
      background-color: transparent;
    }
.gs_toggle_mode:before {
      content: "";
      position: absolute;
      padding: 2px;
      width: 30px;
      height: 30px;
      background-color: var(--gs-primary);
      content: "☽";
      font-size: 20px;
      text-align: center;
      transition: transform 0.0s ease;
      border-radius: 100px;
      color:  white;
    }
.gs_toggle_mode.active:before {
      background-color: transparent;
      background-color:#ffffff40;
      content:"☼";
      color:  yellow;
    }}
  </style>

  <button class="gs_toggle_mode"></button>
